credit_line: Gift of Anonymous Donor from the Fraser/Martin Collection
title: Embroidered picture
medium:
Medium: silk and wool embroidery on linen foundation, applied to silk
Technique: embroidered in split and stem stitches on plain weave foundation and appliqued to plain weave backing
description: Portrait of King George III embroidered on linen, which was later appliqued to a silk ground fabric.
name: Embroidered picture
